translations.text: By the fig and the olive;<sup foot_note="182770">1</sup>
and by the Mount Sinai,<sup foot_note="182031">1</sup>
and by this city (of Makkah), a haven of peace:
surely We created man in the best mould;<sup foot_note="182771">1</sup>
then We reverted him to the lowest of the low,<sup foot_note="182772">1</sup>
except those who have faith and do righteous deeds. Theirs is a never ending reward.<sup foot_note="182773">1</sup>
Who, then, can give the lie to you, (O Prophet), about the Reward and the Punishment?<sup foot_note="182774">1</sup>
Is not Allah the Greatest of all sovereigns?<sup foot_note="182775">1</sup>
